name: it-era-chatbot-staging-tests
description: Comprehensive test suite for IT-ERA chatbot swarm system

scripts.test:health: node -e "const Tester = require('./chatbot-swarm-test.js'); const t = new Tester(); t.testHealthEndpoint().then(console.log);"
scripts.test:performance: node -e "const Tester = require('./chatbot-swarm-test.js'); const t = new Tester(); t.runAllTests();"

author: IT-ERA Development Team
